H1473.def: = causative action by which a group of people is forced to leave their country to settle somewhere else for an indefinite amount of time

H1540.def: = action by which someone takes off his/her clothes, either entirely or in part, ► as a result of which that person becomes naked or improperly dressed, ≈ which is considered a shameful thing to do

H894.def: = town; ◄ in {L:Mesopotamia<SDBH:שִׁנְעָר>}; ► founded by {L:Nimrod<SDBH:נִמְרֹד>}; location of "tower of Babel"; capital of {L:Chaldean<SDBH:כַּשְׂדִּים>} empire

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H3063.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}, and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

H5892.def: = relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent {L:villages<SDBH:חָצֵר>}, {L:settlements<SDBH:בַּת>}, and {L:pasturelands<SDBH:מִגְרָשׁ>}; ≈ associated with strength and security

H8521.def: = town; ◄ located in {L:Babylon<SDBH:בָּבֶל>}; ► from which a group of {L:Jews<SDBH:יְהוּדִי>} returned to {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H3743.def: = heavenly creature with wings, ► carrying the throne of God, symbol of God's majesty, and associated with his presence

H135.def: = town; ◄ located in {L:Babylon<SDBH:בָּבֶל>}; ► from which a group of {L:Jews<SDBH:יְהוּדִי>} returned to {L:Judea<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}

H3201.def: mostly used in a negated clause; = state in which an activity cannot be carried out, as a result of a lack of skill, strength, or ability of the agent, or other circumstances that make the activity impossible

H5046.def: = causative action by which humans pass on information to others, usually by word of mouth

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H1.def: = direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort

H2233.def: = a flowering plant’s unit of reproduction, capable of developing into another such plant, in some cases also used as food

H518.def: = marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H802.def: = woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not

H1323.def: = direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption

H1569.def: = inhabitant or descendant of {L:Gilead<SDBH:גִּלְעָד>}, tribe and territory of {L:Manasseh<SDBH:מְנַשֶּׁה>}

H7121.def: = action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another

H8034.def: = one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity

H428.def: = marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers

H1245.def: = action by which deities, humans, or animals make an intensive effort to locate (other) humans, animals, objects, or activities, which often requires them to move from one location to another

H3791.def: = a reference to one's name in a written document

H3187.def: = process by which someone's name is put in a family register

H4672.def: = process by which humans or animals discover the person, animal, object or location they were looking for

H1351.def: = action by which humans who have been enslaved regain their freedom, which is normally achieved by paying a price

H3550.def: = a role in which humans, through a process of {L:ordination<SDBH:מלא>} and {L:consecration<SDBH:קדשׁ>}, are responsible for performing religious services on behalf of others

H8660.def: exact meaning unsure: = person in a position of leadership among the Persians; ► used for {L:Nehemiah<SDBH:נְחֶמְיָה>}

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H398.def: = action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object

H6944.def: = state in which a deity differs from humans and other deities in that he cannot be associated with anything that is in any way profane or tainted by sin or other impurities, which is a quality that he desires to see in everything else as well

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H5975.def: = process by which humans, deities, animals, or inanimate objects take position in a certain location in an upright position

H3548.def: = person {L:ordained<SDBH:מלא>} and {L:consecrated<SDBH:קדשׁ>} to perform religious services on behalf of others

H8550.def: exact meaning unsure; possibly: = set consisting of two small objects; ► located in the breast-piece on top of the ephod and used to determine God's will with regard to a certain matter

H702.def: = state in which a countable entity is four in number

H7239.def: = state in which a countable entity is ten thousand in number; ≈ associated with excessively high numbers by which the exact number is relatively unimportant

H5483.def: = large domesticated solid-hoofed quadruped; stockily built in comparison to today's horses, with shorter heads and thicker necks; about 122–142 cm tall, and 2.1 m long; its coat varies from dark to pale brown; it eats plants; ◄ Equus caballus; ► used in battle, both to ride and for pulling chariots; ≈ symbolic of military might; associated with the sun, which was said to ride across the sky in a chariot

H705.def: = state in which a countable entity is four in number

H2568.def: = state in which a countable entity is five in number

H6505.def: = male or female offspring of a male donkey and a female horse (or, but less common, a male horse and a female donkey); stronger than a donkey and more resistant to diseases than horses and donkeys; infertile; usually dark brown in color; has bigger ears than the parent horse; ► used for riding and as pack animals; ≈ associated with a lack of understanding

H3967.def: = state in which a countable entity is one hundred in number

H1581.def: = large quadruped mammal, which may reach a height of 2 m. or more; dromedaries are bigger and a uniform light fawn color; bactrians are darker; they are suited to life in desert areas, store excess food in their humps, can go without water for long periods, and can make long journeys through dry areas; ◄ Camelus dromedarius and Camelus bactrianus; ► they are used for riding and for carrying heavy loads and pulling carts; their hair is woven into cloth used for making tents or outer robes; their milk is used as food and drink; ≈ they are a symbol of wealth and commerce, but unclean and not to be eaten

H8337.def: = state in which a countable entity is six in number

H505.def: = generic term for domesticated oxen, both male and female; ► kept for milk and used for plowing

H2543.def: = domestic animal belonging to the same family as the horse, but smaller and with longer ears; it can have variety of colors from dark brown, through light brown to gray and occasionally white; ◄ |iEquus Asinus africanus;|i* ► used to ride on, carry loads, or do other work; ≈ highly regarded; for male see {L:עַיִר<SDBH:עַיִר>}; female see {L:אָתֹון<SDBH:אָתֹון>}

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H3389.def: = town, formerly referred to as {L:Salem<SDBH:שָׁלֵם>} and {L:Jebus<SDBH:יְבוּס>};◄ located on Mt. {L:Zion<SDBH:צִיֹּון>}; territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► conquered by king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}, who made it the capital of his kingdom

H7218.def: = upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities

H1.def: = direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort

H5068.def: = causative action by which humans are made willing by their inner person to perform a certain task

H5975.def: = process by which humans, deities, animals, or inanimate objects take position in a certain location in an upright position

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H4349.def: = a firm location, suitable for building upon; ≈ often used for the place where the temple of God was built

H3581.def: = state in which humans, animals or deities have the ability to perform actions, or to prevail in, or endure situations that require the exertion or mustering of effort or force

H214.def: = valuable goods in one's possession; ≈ falsely considered a source of well-being

H4399.def: = an activity involving a physical effort and usually requiring a certain amount of training or skill

H7239.def: = state in which a countable entity is ten thousand in number; ≈ associated with excessively high numbers by which the exact number is relatively unimportant

H505.def: = generic term for domesticated oxen, both male and female; ► kept for milk and used for plowing

H1871.def: = gold coin, used in Persian empire

H2091.def: = metal of a bright yellow color, ◄ found in rocks and alluvial deposits ► and used as a monetary standard and in jewellery and plating; ≈ associated with wealth, beauty, and prosperity

H2568.def: = state in which a countable entity is five in number

H4488.def: = weight of approximately 0.6 kilograms; equals 50 {L:shekels<SDBH:שֶׁקֶל>}; ► used for payment

H3701.def: = silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins

H3967.def: = state in which a countable entity is one hundred in number

H3548.def: = person {L:ordained<SDBH:מלא>} and {L:consecrated<SDBH:קדשׁ>} to perform religious services on behalf of others

H3801.def: = an undergarment, ◄ woven of linen, ► and worn by the High Priest and his fellow priests; it was worn over the {L:breeches<SDBH:מִכְנָס>}, but from the waist up it was next to the skin; it was a kind of shirt and probably had long sleeves and reached nearly to the ankles and was held in place by a sash wound around the waist.

H3548.def: = person {L:ordained<SDBH:מלא>} and {L:consecrated<SDBH:קדשׁ>} to perform religious services on behalf of others

H3881.def: = man and tribe; ◄ third son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, later responsible for temple duties

H7891.def: = action by which one utters words with a set or improvised tune, whether accompanied by musical instruments and dancing or not

H7778.def: = a person responsible for guarding the entrance of a town or building

H5411.def: literally, "the ones given" or "the dedicated ones"; hence = persons who were responsbile for doing regular tasks in the Temple and for serving the priests

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H5892.def: = relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent {L:villages<SDBH:חָצֵר>}, {L:settlements<SDBH:בַּת>}, and {L:pasturelands<SDBH:מִגְרָשׁ>}; ≈ associated with strength and security

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter
